heading: india rail disaster
subheading: hundreds of people are feared dead following the head-on collision early monday of two trains in eastern india, according to the bbc. early reports indicated that as many as 500 people were killed and another 1,000 injured in the crash, which may have occurred because of a signal failure. officials dismissed the possibility that an explosion aboard one train may have triggered the accident, but a bbc report saying that one train was carrying explosives was not refuted. the accident occurred around 1:30 a.m. local time, on the line between new delhi and gauhati.
author: wired staff
text: hundreds of people are feared dead following the head-on collision early monday of two trains in eastern india, according to the bbc. early reports indicated that as many as 500 people were killed and another 1,000 injured in the crash, which may have occurred because of a signal failure. officials dismissed the possibility that an explosion aboard one train may have triggered the accident, but a bbc report saying that one train was carrying explosives was not refuted. the accident occurred around 1:30 a.m. local time, on the line between new delhi and gauhati.
